page.original:
.LINK_FILTER_EXPR_GET() Syntax OutputString as C = .LINK_FILTER_EXPR_GET() Description The .LINK_FILTER_EXPR_GET() method returns the filter expression set when linking two tables in a set. Example dim st as P dim tb as P st = set.open("invoice") tb = table.current(2) ? tb.link_filter_expr_get() = FIRSTNAME="michael"
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Set Functions and Methods
